item.title: 28 Marie Skłodowska-Curie PhD Fellowships Available
item.description: 28 Marie Skłodowska-Curie PhD fellowships are available at the University of Copenhagen Faculty of Science via the TALENT program. The fellowship offers applicants employment as PhD fellows for a period of three years on a research topic of the fellow’s choice. The current call is open from 15 February to 1 April 2019 for a start date in Autumn 2019. Candidates are required to have completed a Master’s degree at the time of application, to not have resided in Denmark in the past 12 months, and to have a recent English language certificate.
